pages.text: <li>produced by the <l>(genetics/mutagen_producer)Mutagen Producer</l> from various solid items<li>required to run the <l>(genetics/mutatron)Mutatron</l> and <l>(genetics/mutatron_advanced)Advanced Mutatron</l>
<li>produced by the <l>(genetics/liquifier)Liquifier</l><li>used by the <l>(genetics/replicator)Replicator</l> to construct new organisms
<li>produced by the <l>(genetics/extractor)Extractor</l><li>used by the <l>(genetics/replicator)Replicator</l> to construct new organisms
